reviews.title: Needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: This app looks as though most of the information has been pulled from various image sources but also lacking in substance. It diverts to Wolfram Alpha for most utilities and I suspect that the locked functions will do the same.
reviews.author: Adam Hamilton

reviews.title: angelika
reviews.comment: i got most of my math homework done using this app. it is great to use when u need to find out a definition and not have to use google
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: It had everything but decimals... which is the thing i needed... but it\'s good coz i think it has everything else :)
